long_description:
With Christmas approaching, travelers and locals alike seek festive experiences to warm the heart. New York is not short of holiday spirit, but Bryant Park’s Winter Village does have a special touch that set its apart from other holiday markets. Plus, it’s located two blocks from the Royalton Hotel.

 

The Bank of America Winter Village at Bryant Park is a holiday tradition widely loved by Manhattanites. Not only does it feature the only free ice-skating rink in the city, but also plays host to over 150 independent vendors, artisans and chefs selling original clothing, mouth-watering food, one-of-a-kind gifts and much more. This year, the Holiday Shops at Bryant Park run from October 28, 2017 to January 2nd, 2018.

 

Bryant Park might seem compact when compared with Central Park, but its grandeur is difficult to match. What with a Christmas Tree to rival the Rockefeller Center’s tree, the Rink, the seasonal Public Fare restaurant and the permanent attractions, such as Le Carrousel and the Lowell Fountain, you can easily spend hours ambling through the park.

 

First time visitors to the Winter Village tend to be awestruck by the exquisite quality of products and cuisine sold in the Holiday Shops. And returning customers aren’t disappointed no matter how often they go back. Vendors are carefully curated every year to ensure that only the most creative and ambitious entrepreneurs make the cut. Add to it the beautiful holiday decorations and you’ll begin to think that Christmas was invented in Bryant Park.  

 

When perusing the Holiday Shops, you’ll find everything from mom-and-pop stores with welcoming attendants to top-notch chefs selling gourmet dishes and drinks. If you’re seeking Christmas presents beyond the mainstream stores, take your time to pop in and out of stands selling gifts, home accessories, holiday ornaments, health and beauty supplies, artwork and apparel. You can consult the full list of vendors here.

 

Are you ready to spend the most wonderful time of the year in New York? Start by booking your room at the Royalton and choosing from our special offers. The Royalton is near everything worth visiting in the city, making it a sophisticated base to scout for the best holiday spots in New York City, with the added bonus of real working fireplaces. We’re the only hotel in the city that with welcome you with a crackling fire in select rooms. What else could you ask for this winter?
